name: Tower of Power (craighughes)
description:
Tower Of Power

Action, Strategy, Tower Defense

——————————————————————————————————

Tower of Power is a 2d tower strategy game where you will fight hordes of enemies to collect scrolls of power from bosses. Collect enough scrolls and defeat the archmage and rule the world.

Alexander Talbott- Producer / Design

Craig Hughes- Programmer

Seth Weeks- Boss Art / Sound Design

Parker DeVenney- Enemy Art / Environment Art
